name: tsd-check-fail
description: like tsd-check but allows to check for false, this is a function like expectNotType(). Works by compiling given string and check for errors

scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma all --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --no-bracket-spacing  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npx shx rm -rf dist/**/__tests__
